title: Lifelong Mathematics Learning Program for Enhancing Disaster Resilience

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and data interpretation competencies
context.additional_context: Targeting Office/Administrative Workers Needing Basic Numeracy Skills for Disaster Response, Considering Resource-Limited Environments Through Smartphone-Based Learning

learning_goals: Learners can read and interpret disaster-related statistical data.
Learners can apply basic probability formulas for risk assessment.
Learners can construct linear programming models to establish optimal recovery plans with limited resources.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
